channel.title: ~Server Problems ~
channel.description:
Hi all
As some of you may know i have released ganderscape lastnight
My server has been crashing alot and getting alot of errors
Im getting a "java lang out of memory" error which crashes my server
Ontop of that im getting another error that says "client null disconected"
it mostly happens when someone connects to the server :(
has anyone got a fix?? could you please help me ? it would be aprecieted :)
the next problem i have is ... well weve started ancients magicks weve put it in the server compiled with no errors
but what seems to happen is we keep getting "you do not have enough runes for this spell"
even tho we have the runes and the level
If anyone could help us fix these errors i would happily make them a mod on the server if they wished
Thanks
~Gander [br][size=1]Posted at: April 21, 2006, 08:30:05 am[/size][hr]noobs -.- lol :|
jk
someone help me out here

item.title: ~Server Problems ~
